articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: The Bill Gates Portfolio: 3 Of His Ancor Holdings Every Investor Should Consider. Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) founder Bill gates is best-known for his founding of the most valuable company in the world (on multiple occasions, just not now). And rightfully so. That said, over the years, Bill Gates has adjusted his portfolio holdings, choosing to divest in a range of companies via his own personal portfolio but also via his ... articles.title: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.mainIdea: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped. Investors began to notice that Warren Buffett began being more conservative with the stock market three years ago, and that streak has continued even as the S&P 500 hit new peaks and beyond. He sold Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL), Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), VeriSign (NASDAQ:VRSN), DaVita (NYSE:DVA), D.R. Horton (NYSE:DHI), and Nucor (NYSE:NUE) as of Q3 2025. ... articles.title: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services
articles.mainIdea: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services
articles.summary: Hospital Management: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services. The city will incentivise DHR Health with a $2m grant under the Texas Chapter 380 Grant Agreement.
